articles.author: Rounak Jain
articles.title: Reliance teams up with US-based Sanmina to create a high-tech electronics manufacturing hub in India
articles.description: Mukesh Ambani’s Reliance announced a partnership with Sanmina, a US-based electronics manufacturer. Reliance and Sanmina will set up a joint venture with $200
articles.content:
After renewable energy, Mukesh Ambani
 has now set his eyes on high-tech electronics manufacturing in India. A wholly-owned subsidiary of Reliance Industries has entered into a pact with the US-base… [+2088 chars]
